General.Name: Sriwahana
General.Description: PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk manufactures and sells corrugated carton packaging solutions in Indonesia. The company operates through Corrugated, Paper tube, Paper Cone, and Paper roll segments. It offers corrugated carton for use in transport, consumer, non-direct contact food, and non-food packaging applications; paper cones; and paper tubes. Its boxes are used in fruit and produce, beverage, snack, and garment and textile industries. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Boyolali, Indonesia. PT Sriwahana Adityakarta Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumber Makmur Lumintu.
General.Address: Jl. Raya Solo - Yogya KM. 16, Boyolali, Indonesia
